articles.content:

articles.title: 'Quiet quitting' is what angry managers call employees setting healthy job limits
articles.description: Companies are freaking out over "quiet quitting." But employees aren't refusing to do their jobs — they're just setting healthy limits around work.

It's time to stop playing into this terrible "quiet quitting" craze.
